result:
@require '~@theme/styles/variables'

$gutter = 0.4rem
$fontSize = 1rem

.post-tag
  display inline-flex
  justify-content center
  margin 0 0.2rem
  height $fontSize + $gutter * 2
  line-height $fontSize
  padding $gutter $gutter * 1.5
  color lighten($grayTextColor, 10%)
  background-color #fff
  transition color 0.2s ease-out
  &:hover
    cursor pointer
    color $accentColor
    .icon
      fill $accentColor
  .post-tag-name
    display inline-block
    height 100%
    font-size $fontSize
    font-weight normal
    margin-left $gutter
  &:not(:first-of-type)
    margin-left $gutter
